professional_summary: Oracle Database Administrator with eight years' experience providing data management and DBA functions, specializing in Oracle 12c/11g database administration, performance tuning, and designing databases for biomedical contracting applications.

key_responsibilities: and troubleshoot Oracle 12c/11g databases on Linux and Windows OS.
Managed and maintained Oracle 12c/11g database servers across multiple environments.
Installed and managed Oracle Enterprise Manager.
Performed bulk load into the database using SQL Loader.
Conducted standard and fine-grained database auditing.
Used Data Pump and Export/Import utilities for logical backups.
Monitored user sessions and took appropriate action to kill inactive sessions.
Created and rebuilt indexes as necessary.
Configured RMAN parameters and performed physical backups using RMAN utility.
Identified and recovered corrupted database blocks using Block recover option in RMAN.
Installed and configured network components for database access and integrity.
Resolved Oracle connectivity problems and provided troubleshooting assistance for Oracle Forms.
Balanced data conversion and configuration scalability.
Performed regular maintenance tasks such as tablespace repair and database backup.

Oracle Database Administration",
